subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Chris Huff, not Moon?
author: juli velazquez
full_text:
--0-1529373082-1197259928=:55096
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

yes I actually do.  Chris was in a band called cold moon, thus the name Chris Moon was born.

"M.A. Coletta (Mike)" <michaelcoletta@...> wrote:          This is just a meaningless tidbit I thought I'd share...

While doing some internet reading this evening I came across a few 
articles which led me to think that Chris Moon may be a "stage name" 
for the person actually named, Chris Huff (Christopher Edward Huff to 
be exact). I see his daughters last name is Huff, and his fathers last 
name is Huff... so why isn't his, Chris', last name Huff? Anyone got 
the 411 on this a.k.a.?

Here are the three articles I found:

http://ghostofcoast.blogspot.com/2007/03/i-smell-another-scam-about-to-
happen.html (See comment at end of article)

http://www.mscd.edu/~themet/TheMetropolitan/06_07/Vol29_issue30/metrospe
ctive/haunting.html

http://www.masonhouseinn.com/Joy's%20Journal%202006_happenings.htm

- Mike
